resources.string: This application is brought to you by the makers of SnapTools, if you like this app and use Snapchat, maybe consider trying it out! :)
This application provides the ability to disable the ART Optimisations performed by android to speed applications up
ART Deoptimiser does nothing for android versions below Nougat.\nAs a result, this application will not run on this device
This application requires External Storage Read/Write access. Without these permissions the application will terminate
As you\'ve declined a vital permission request the application will terminate

Why do you people read this shit?
For changes to take affect, the app requires a complete uninstall & reinstall
